Title: Be in the vanguard of the fight against selfishness, be a pathbreaker in the combat against revisionism
Designer: Shaanxi Province Workers, Peasants and Soldiers Culture Studio (陕西省工农兵文化工作室編繪)
Notes: Young Red Guards with brushes and paper for making big-character posters. They are holding copies of Mao's Three Constantly Read Articles and Mao Zedong Selected Works.
Theme: Cultural Revolution Campaigns (1966-1976)Three Constantly Read Articles
